ProjectTitle: Role of multinucleated giant cells in granulomatous autoinflammatory disease: Focus on NOD2-associated Blau syndrome
InitialFeedbackHistory:
12/06/2023
Documentation: please focus here on how you will document your data, where you store and secure your data is part of the next question, will you use e-notebooks, readme files etc? For more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata
Sharing: When looking for repositories please have a look at EGA (https://ega-archive.org/) and KU Leuven RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) where you can share data under restricted access, for more information see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing or contact dac@uzleuven.be
label: good with suggestions
